;


[UserData]
    ComputerName = computername 
    FullName = Username full 
    OrgName = Organisation

[GuiUnattended]
    AdminPassword = univention
    AutoLogon = Yes
    AutoLogonCount = 1
    OEMSkipRegional = 1
    TimeZone = 110
    OemSkipWelcome = 1

[LicenseFilePrintData]
    AutoMode = PerServer
    AutoUsers = 1000

[GuiRunOnce]

[Display]
    BitsPerPel = 16
    Vrefresh = 75
    Xresolution = 1024
    Yresolution = 768

[Components]
    cdplayer = Off
    chat = Off
    dialer = Off
    freecell = Off
    media_clips = Off
    minesweeper = Off
    mousepoint = Off
    mplay = Off
    pinball = Off
    rec = Off
    solitare = Off
    TSEnable = On

[TerminalServices]
    ApplicationServer = 1
    PermissionSettings = 0

[TapiLocation]
    CountryCode = 49
    AreaCode = 0421

[Identification]
    JoinDomain = @%@windows/domain@%@
    DomainAdmin = Administrator 
    DomainAdminPassword = univention
   
[Networking]
    InstallDefaultComponents = No

[NetAdapters]
    Adapter1 = params.Adapter1

[params.Adapter1]
    INFID = *

[NetClients]
    MS_MSClient = params.MS_MSClient

[NetServices]
    MS_SERVER = params.MS_SERVER

[NetProtocols]
    MS_TCPIP = params.MS_TCPIP

[params.MS_TCPIP]
    DNS = No
    UseDomainNameDevolution = No
    EnableLMHosts = Yes
    AdapterSections = params.MS_TCPIP.Adapter1

[params.MS_TCPIP.Adapter1]
    SpecificTo = Adapter1
    DHCP = Yes
    WINS = @%@windows/wins-support@%@ 

[NetOptionalComponents]
    ; Install Print Services for UNIX
    LPDSVC = 1

; This section is for informational purposes.
; Windows Setup does not use it.
[_meta]
    fdisk_lba = 1
    edit_files = 0
    replace_mbr = 1
    local_admin_group = ""
    local_admins = ""
    ntp_servers = "ntp.fu-berlin.de"
    fdisk_cmds="fdisk /clear 1;fdisk /pri:4000;fdisk /activate:1"
    format_cmd = "format /Q /V: /Z:seriously C:"
    ; Prompt for confirmation before running fdisk_cmds?
    fdisk_confirm = 0 
    ; First script run by postinst.bat
    top = "top.bat"
    ; Optional script(s) run by postinst.bat
    middle = "middle.bat"
    ; Last script(s) run by postinst.bat
    bottom = "bottom.bat"
